{{Wired embedded system |brand=Dell |model=Wyse 3010 |revision=-T50 Thin / Zero Client |asin=B006LICCCY |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Inventec |manuf_rev=<!-- TX0 T50 1GF/1GR DVI ES --> |availability=EoL (10/31/2017) |est_release_date=04/2013 |pcb_id=6050A2350601-MB-A01 |type=thin client |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.5 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88AP510 |cpu1_cspeed=1.0 GHz |fla1=1 GiB |fla1_brand=Toshiba |fla1_model=TC58NVG3S0FTA00 |fla2=4 |fla2_brand=Macronix |fla2_model=MX25L3206EM2I-12G |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B2G0846D-BYK0 |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, USB 2.0 |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=4 |jtag=yes,, 16-pin header,, CN548 |serial=yes,, 5-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, CN666 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1310S |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=Audio DAC Chip;Realtek;ALC5630;;1;,,, Serial ATA Bridge Chip;JMicron;JMD330;;1;,,, DVI Transmitter;Silicon Image;Sil164CTG64;;1;,,, 4-port USB Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL850G;;1;,,, OLPC Keyboard Controller;ENE Technology;KB3930;;1;,,, 1MB Serial NOR Flash;Macronix;MX25L8006EM2I-12G;;1;,,, EEPROM Programmable Clock Generator;IDT;IDT5V49EE503;;1;,,, ATA Flash Disk Controller;Silicon Storage Tech;SST55VD020;;1;,,, DDR Termination Regulator;Global Mixed-mode Technology;G2997;;1;,,, 30V 13.3A N-Channel Power Trench MOSFET;Fairchild;FDMC7692;;1;,,, 30V 49A N-Channel Power Trench MOSFET;Fairchild;FDMS0308AS;;1;,,, 30V Asymmetric Dual N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega;AO4932;;1;,,, 2.5A Current Limit High Side Switch;Rohm Semi;BD82034FVJ;;4;,,, 12V 4.5A 500kHz Step-Down Regulator;Marvell;88PH845;;3;,,, 30V 35A P-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega;AON7401;;1;,,, 1MHz Dual Step-down Regulator;Marvell;88PG8226;;1; |flags=SD Card slot, Audio in/out (3.5mm), DVI-I, power switch, RTC w/ battery |stock_boot=WLoader; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.32-317;ThinOS; |oui_eth=00:80:64 }} {{TagLine|Wyse 3010-T50 Thin / Zero Client}} :[https://www.dell.com/support/home/en-us/product-support/product/wyse-3010tc-series/overview Support page] {{•}} [https://www.wysechoice.co.uk/p/dell-wyse-3010-t50-1gbf-1gbr-linux-909563-02l-r Spec.]
*OEM: [[Inventec]] • PCB ID: 6050A2350601-MB-A01
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Marvell]] 88AP510 @1.0GHz ARM v7 (PJ4 core) *GPU: ''Vivante GC600'' (OpenGL 3.0/ES 2.0, OpenVG) *Storage: 4MB (SPI NOR), 1GB (NAND), SD Card slot *Memory: 1GB (DDR3) SDRAM *Network: 1x GbE port *USB: 4x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 12V/2.5A via barrel
===See also=== :;[[Dell]] *[[Dell Wyse 3010-T50 Thin / Zero Client]] *[[Dell Wyse 3020 Thin / Zero Client]] *[[Dell Wyse Cloud Connect]] *[[Wyse WT1125SE]] (''Wyse Technology'')
